pages.text: Very rarely, you may come across a 'tell' - a small glint of ore embedded in rock. It signifies a rich ore deposit hidden in the rocks around you. Right click the tell with a $(item)Hammer$() and a $(thing)Heavy Ore Seam$() will be revealed in the surrounding stone.

Heavy ore seams are hugely dense deposits of ore. Each block can be mined repeatedly, but as a tradeoff it takes a long time. The ore will drop ore-rich rock, which does not stack...except in the minecarts designed to handle it. It is probably worth setting up outposts to mine out these ore seams.
